catalog_script_client.name: Organisation - populate Org AD groups

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_3aad3a5b1bd6a4505e72ebd5604bcbf7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Ansible Tower Manage Teams">22ad7a1b1bd6a4505e72ebd5604bcb0a</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0b4694a2db8a20101407c7ec0b961932</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Organisation - populate Org AD groups</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   // Based on the org group set up value and org name populate the AD group names
   var org_name = g_form.getValue('organisation_name');
   var org_setup = g_form.getValue('organisation_group_setup');
   if (org_setup == 'ALL'){
       g_form.setValue('organisation_admins','SSC-AWX-ALL-ORGADMIN-' + org_name );
       g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_admins', true);
       g_form.setValue('organisation_members','SSC-AWX-ALL-ORG-' + org_name );
       g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_members', true);
   } 
   if (org_setup == 'SPLIT') {
       g_form.setValue('organisation_admins','SSC-AWX-DEVTEST-ORGADMIN-' + org_name +  "\n"  + 'SSC-AWX-DEV-ORGADMIN-' + org_name +  "\n" + 'SSC-AWX-UAT-ORGADMIN-' + org_name +  "\n"  + 'SSC-AWX-PRD-ORGADMIN-' + org_name );
       g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_admins', true);
       g_form.setValue('organisation_members','SSC-AWX-DEVTEST-ORG-' + org_name +  "\n" + 'SSC-AWX-DEV-ORG-' + org_name +  "\n"  + 'SSC-AWX-UAT-ORG-' + org_name +  "\n" + 'SSC-AWX-PRD-ORG-' + org_name );
       g_form.setReadOnly('organisation_members', true);
   }   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>e663988</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-18 15:50:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3aad3a5b1bd6a4505e72ebd5604bcbf7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Organisation - populate Org AD groups</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower" source="x_ibmss_gts_oar_at">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_3aad3a5b1bd6a4505e72ebd5604bcbf7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>e663988</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-24 13:00:40</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Ansible Tower Organisation">99bbb51a1bca28d45e72ebd5604bcbb0</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
